card0.name: Pikachu
card0.description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

card1.name: Charizard
card1.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

card2.name: Bulbasaur
card2.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

card3.name: Squirtle
card3.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

card4.name: Caterpie
card4.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

card5.name: Weedle
card5.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

card6.name: Pidgey
card6.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

card7.name: Rattata
card7.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

card8.name: Spearow
card8.description: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

card9.name: Ekans CHANGED
card9.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

card10.name: Quaxly
card10.description: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.

card11.name: Arctibax
card11.description: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

card12.name: Sylveon
card12.description: This Pokémon uses its ribbonlike feelers to send a soothing aura into its opponents, erasing their hostility.

card13.name: Mimikyu
card13.description: This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.

card14.name: Bewear
card14.description: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.

card15.name: Darkrai
card15.description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

card16.name: Registeel
card16.description: Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

card17.name: Eevee
card17.description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

card18.name: Kyurem
card18.description: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
